plot: Mr Bean goes to the hospital to have a tea kettle removed from his hand and then tries to get admitted faster. Afterwards, he tries to take a picture with a royal guard. Mr Bean then has problems with insomnia.

Mr. Bean goes to the hospital to have a tea kettle removed from his hand, and while trying to get in faster ends up with him getting in much later. Afterwards, he decorates a British guard so that he can take a picture. After he has insomnia, Mr. Bean finally finds the solution and falls asleep.—Todd Suess
